details:
This update adds size checks to thumbnail extraction. Prior to these checks, it
was possible to overflow arguments to e.g. malloc and thus cause out-of-bounds
memory accesses.


For Debian 10 buster, this problem has been fixed in version
0.19.2-2+deb10u2.


We recommend that you upgrade your libraw packages.


For the detailed security status of libraw please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/libraw>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
